projects.name: Movie App
projects.Description: A responsive movie discovery app built with React and The Movie Database (TMDB) API. It features dynamic routing, real-time movie data, and accessibility-friendly design, including loading states, error handling, and a 404 page for invalid routes.

projects.name: Weather app
projects.Description: Responsive weather application that connects to the OpenWeatherMap API to display real-time weather data. The app shows the current weather, temperature in Celsius, and a 4-day forecast for selected locations. This project highlights API integration skills, dynamic UI updates, and working with external data sources.

projects.name: Business Project
projects.Description: Created a modern, responsive business website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The layout is built with Flexbox and CSS Grid, enhanced with subtle animations and transitions for a smooth user experience. The site includes a functional contact form with input validation and form submission features. This project showcases clean design, responsiveness, and attention to user interaction.

projects.name: Recipe Project
projects.Description: Built a recipe search tool using the Spoonacular API. Styled to match a Figma design, with JavaScript handling user input and conditional messages.

projects.name: Domain Business Site
projects.Description: Worked on a domain registration website where customers could search, request, and manage their domains. The platform included features for managing value-added services, and handling secure payments directly through the site. Gained experience in full-stack development, customer workflows, and payment integration.

projects.name: E-Learning Platform with Moodle
projects.Description: Set up and configured a full Moodle-based e-learning website, handling installation, system setup, and admin configurations. Created and managed training courses focused on WordPress development, including course structure, content uploads, and user access. This project highlights experience with LMS platforms, server-side setup, and online course delivery.

projects.name: Travel Site
projects.Description: An upcoming project focused on showcasing top travel destinations across Sri Lanka, featuring a place directory, booking list, and price comparison tools. The goal is to build a user-friendly platform that helps travelers explore, plan, and book trips with ease. This project will emphasize clean UI design, dynamic content, and integration with travel-related APIs or booking systems.
